title: Cricket Professional Friction Free Pick Comb
description: Proprietary blend of polymers to reduce friction caused by brushing and styling hair-creating a smooth finish. Bristles are ion infused with tourmaline to impart moisture into the hair shaft, reducing static electricity and creating incredible smooth shine. Attractive ergonomic design with non-slip grip. Ideal for lifting or fluffing to add volume.

title: Pack of 500 Small Black Rubber Bands for Styling, Kids Hair, Braids Hair, Dreadlocks, Babies, Hair Twists, Ethnic Styles and Even Fishing, Urban Essence Brand
description: Pack of 500 small rubber bands that is great for both hair care and many other uses around the house and outdoors.

title: The Wet Comb Detangling Hair Comb - Metallics Collection (Colors May Vary)
description: The Waved Teeth distribute hair evenly across the tooth shaft for easy combing. Good for detangling Wet or Dry Hair For all hair lengths Use on thick, curly or straight hair. Great for hair extensions & wigs.
